name: Amplitude
blurb: A rhythm-action music game for PlayStation\u00ae4 & PlayStation\u00ae3 based on Amplitude\u2122, the 2003 cult classic by Harmonix!

rewards.reward: THANKS - A hearty thank you from Harmonix and your name as a backer in the game credits!\r\n\r\n(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)

EARLY BACKER PRICE - Get a Cross-Buy code of the full game for PlayStation®4/PlayStation®3 at launch!

Limited to the first 1,000 backers through the door! Includes getting your name in the game credits!

(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)

GET THE GAME - Get a Cross-Buy code of the full game for PlayStation\u00ae4/PlayStation\u00ae3 at launch! Includes getting your name in the game credits!\r\n\r\n(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)

EARLY GAME ACCESS - Be among the first to own the game! Get a Cross-Buy code of the full game for PlayStation\u00ae4/PlayStation\u00ae3 TWO WEEKS before the regular public. Tune up your skills and get ready to top the leaderboards before the rest of the world gets their hands on the game! Includes getting your name in the game credits!\r\n\r\n(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)
All previous tiers PLUS an EXCLUSIVE ORIGINAL PRINT created for this Kickstarter based on the art of Amplitude!  \r\n\r\n(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)
All previous reward tiers PLUS a SWEET PS2\u00ae STYLE CASE WITH NEW BOX ART. An old school case suited for display FTW! \r\n\r\n(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)
All previous reward tiers PLUS a RAD T-SHIRT created for this Kickstarter based on the art of Amplitude!\r\n\r\n(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)

COLLECTOR'S EDITION - All previous reward tiers PLUS an EXCLUSIVE VINYL RECORD of the original soundtrack for this release. Get an amazing record with an included digital download code for the music, and killer LP sleeve! The record will only feature original music composed for this new version of the game.\r\n\r\n(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)

VIP PAX EAST LAUNCH PARTY: Join Harmonix for an Amplitude launch party in Boston during the weekend of PAX East 2015! We\u2019ll invite all backers at this tier to a swanky get together, complete with Amplitude gameplay, hang outs with Harmonix developers, and probably some REALLY good snacks. PAX East dates are TBA, and the venue will be determined by the number of backers. Does not include travel, lodging, or badges to PAX. Includes the COLLECTOR\u2019S EDITION. (Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----).

VIP PACKAGE (Very Important Panel) - Join us for our Harmonix Panel at PAX Prime 2014! We'll make sure you get kick-ass seats, do some dumb stuff with you while you're there, treat you like royalty and generally be your best friends for EXACTLY ONE SEATTLE HOUR. 

Does not include travel, lodging, or badges to the event. Does include COLLECTOR’S EDITION rewards and smiles (well…probably on the smiles).

(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)

SONG SENATE - You think YOU know what it takes to make the most balanced electronic soundtrack? FINE. PROVE IT. We're letting up to 500 people in on the process of getting music in the game. We'll explain our goals for the soundtrack, solicit tracks you think would be fun to have in the game, keep you in the loop as tracks are or aren't approved for use, and let you vote on which ones actually make the cut for the final game. 

CAVEAT: we are planning on using a heavily HMX driven soundtrack (as is tradition). Our ability to pursue and use licensed music will be determined by funding level of the project.

COLLECTOR'S EDITION rewards are included in this tier.

(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)

VISIT TO HARMONIX - Are you an elite rhythm player? We'll bring the 10 backers in this tier to Harmonix for a day of beta testing, design meetings, and coaching. It will end with a tournament full of fun and some hilarious prizes. 

Airfare and one night of hotel included. Continental US only. This tier includes previous reward tiers (except for Panel Guest privileges).

(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)

DINNER WITH OUR FOUNDERS - Take over our CEO and CTO's ears for a delightful and fancy meal. Profess your love, pitch your game, ask them about their old terrible haircuts, or tell them how much you regret backing this level in the Kickstarter. 

Continental US only; Ideally this would be in a major metropolitan area, but alternately we'll make it possible for everyone to be in the same city for a single meal... 

Includes  previous tiers (excluding PAX Panel and Visit to Harmonix).  

(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)

DINNER WITH TIM SCHAFER - Because who wants to talk to the Harmonix guys when you can talk to the guy who made PSYCHONAUTS and GRIM EFFING FANDANGO!? 

Bay Area meals only, no included travel, Tim gets to pick the restaurant. 

Includes previous tiers (excluding PAX Panel, Visit to Harmonix, and meal with Harmonix founders, though Alex Rigopulos will probably crash this meal out of jealousy).

(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)

YOUR SONG IN THE GAME - If you completely own the rights to a song, have stemmed audio of its separate parts, and it isn't SUPER OBJECTIONABLE (aka full of non-T for Teen lyrics, 25 minutes long, a cover, or silence), we'll remix it, author it up and put it in Amplitude as bonus content! 

Includes previous tiers (excluding PAX Panel, Visit to Harmonix, and "Meal Tiers").  

(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)

HARMONIX THROWS YOU A PARTY - A handful of Harmonixers will fly to your house, play the game with you, and then throw a bitchin party for you and a handful of your friends. This includes music, food, and stupidity. You can stream it out over Twitch on your console, document it with cool photos and videos, or keep it a DARK SECRET.

Continental US locations only.

Includes previous tiers (excluding PAX Panel, Visit to Harmonix, "Meals" and "Get Your Song in the Game").  

(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)

BENEFACTOR PACKAGE: Fly to Boston for a guided tour of Harmonix, a jam session with some of our best musicians, a helicopter tour of the city in the "Rigopulopter" (Alex's imaginary helicopter...actually it'll be conducted by a real helicopter tour company because we don't own a helicopter), and other Harmonix madness you can only dream of. 

Includes airfare and 1 night of hotel (Continental US only). Also includes previous tiers (excluding PAX Panel, Visit to Harmonix, "Meals", "Get Your Song in the Game", and "House Party").  

(Latest tier information in the body of the page to the left <----)
